copy.lead: We'll take you through a focused check on daily life, safety, and health so Navi can recommend the right level of care. It takes about two minutes and saves automatically, so you can pause anytime.
copy.helper_self: Answer from your own perspective and we'll tailor the plan to what you share.
copy.helper_supporter: Answer on behalf of {NAME} and we'll turn your answers into the clearest next steps for both of you.
points: Know what to expect at each step in plain language
See the care level Navi recommends for {RELATION}
Leave with guidance you can act on right away
copy.navi_title: I'm here to guide you through each question.
copy.navi_line: You'll answer a few short questions about safety, daily help, and health - and you'll get a personalized recommendation for the best senior care option.
